title: Chapter 9B - Signs
content:
Chapter 9B - Signs

State Regulations
§ 9B.04 - Bike Lane Signs and Plaques (R3-17, R3-17aP, R3-17bP)
§ 9B.06 - Bicycles May Use Full Lane Sign (R4-11)
§ 9B.20 - Bicycle Guide Signs (D1-1b, D1-1c, D1-2b, D1-2c, D1-3b, D1-3c, D11-1, D11-1c)
§ 9B.21 - Bicycle Route Signs (M1-8, M1-8a, M1-9)
§ 9B.22 - Bicycle Route Sign Auxiliary Plaques

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
